dt-example.title: Fomantic-UI (formally Semantic-UI) styling
dt-example.info:
This is the `-init searchPanes`extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows DataTables and the searchPanes extension being used with [Fomantic-UI](https://fomantic-ui.com) (a maintained fork of [Semantic-UI](https://semantic-ui.com/)). The DataTables / Fomantic-UI integration provides seamless integration for DataTables to be used in a Fomantic-UI page.
